description: Versatile, comfortable short-sleeved shirt in G-1000 Air Stretch with functional pockets in G-1000 Eco Stretch – Räven Shirt SS M is perfect for outdoor adventures as well as everyday urban life. The comfort fit allows good airflow around the body and provides enough room to wear a layer under- neath. Two large, buttoned pockets with bellows and extra openings at the sides, and two chest pockets with buttoned flaps.
name: Fjallraven Raven SS Shirt - Mens
